title: Away from spotlight, healthcare throws big lifeline to IT sector
description: India's IT companies have found a resilient growth engine in healthcare. This contrasts with the sluggish performance of financial services, retail, and hi-tech, which have faced headwinds for nearly two years.
content: The healthcare business of Indiaâ€™s IT companies has been silently spearheading the $250 billion industry's growth, being a bright spot at a time when key verticals such as financial services, retail and hi-tech have been under pressure for almost two years now.
